StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [ValidateReferralSSN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ReferralSSN varchar(9) AS BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT Count(person_ID) validReferralSSN FROM MCRISS.dbo.Person AS P WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ReferralSSN AND ( P.PERSON_ID in (SELECT MARINE_ID FROM MCRISS.dbo.MARINE) OR P.PERSON_ID in (SELECT MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID FROM MCRISS.dbo.Marine_Candidate) ) END
